sentences.en: Chen Liangshao's epitaph was discovered in 2002 to be possessed by a curio merchant.
sentences.cn: 提要:陈良绍墓志于2002年春在古玩商人处发现.

sentences.en: Have a cup of coffee, browse the magazines and enjoy the curio, nothing better than that!
sentences.cn: 在这里喝杯咖啡, 翻翻杂志,赏赏古玩,想想心思, 养心养性,是最好不过了.

sentences.en: In the Captain of the Axiom's cabin, there is a lit curio cabinet with a 1980's era white NASA Space Shuttle launch helmet with red and blue pin striping.
sentences.cn: 在真理号船长室里，有一个发光的装古董的橱柜（见下图），里头陈列着上世纪80年代NASA太空船上使用的白色头盔，饰有红蓝条纹。

sentences.en: It is a commercial steer major in calligraphy works, painting, curio, and relevant articles.
sentences.cn: 位于越秀区文德路,是著名的字画古玩一条街,专营名人字画, 壁画, 及画框等字画相关产品.

sentences.en: It is one of the biggest curio shops in the craft brothers in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 在上海同行中是规模较大的古玩店之一.

sentences.en: Red and blue spectacles, it was imagined, would be routinely employed to watch a film. Flat projection would be a historical curio.
sentences.cn: 当时人们认为那种红蓝3D眼镜将是未来观影必备物品，平板投射技术将成为历史古董。

sentences.en: The curio shop backs the post office.
sentences.cn: 古玩店位于邮局的后面.

sentences.en: There are many places of interest in the city - museums, temples, and curio markets.
sentences.cn: 本市有许多有趣的地方,比如博物馆 、 庙宇 、 古董市场.

sentences.en: There was a silence then that filled the little curio shop.
sentences.cn: 接着这个小古董店变得一片寂静.

sentences.en: This curio has passed throgh many hands.
sentences.cn: 这种古玩已经多次转手了.

sentences.en: This set of glass curio was made with the latest technology.
sentences.cn: 这套玻璃古玩是用最新工艺制作的.

sentences.en: Various kinds of ancient clocks in our curio shop are waiting for the respective highest Bids.
sentences.cn: 本古玩店收藏的各种古钟,待价而沽.

sentences.en: Welcome, friend! Welcome to the Old Market Magical Curio shop!
sentences.cn: 欢迎, 朋友! 欢迎来到旧货市场的魔法古玩店!

sentences.en: You'd better declare your curio to the official.
sentences.cn: 你最好把那件古玩向海关官员申报纳税.

words.tran_cn: 好奇，好奇心；珍品，古董，古玩

trans.tran_en: a small object that is interesting because it is beautiful or rare
